title: Patriotic reporting: SA press, government ‘on the same page’ (University of South Africa)
text: ( Source : University of South Africa ) Clockwise , from top left: Moshoeshoe Monare, Deputy Editor of the Mail & Guardian , and panelists Donald Liphoko, acting Director-General of the Government Communication and Information System , Val
